character.name: Gaius Ursus Maximus
character.brief_description: An aggressive military officer whose physical dominance and action-focused nature lead him into a curse that transforms him into an instrument of endless violence.
character.full_description: Maximus is a military officer known for exceptional physical strength and combat mastery. He leads through presence and dominance, preferring direct action over strategic planning. During the crucifixion, he commands the execution detail with brutal efficiency, categorizing weakness with contempt. However, his participation in Christ's death triggers a supernatural curse that freezes him at age 30 and transforms him into an instrument of endless violence. His restlessness becomes compulsive, his aggression becomes autonomous, and he becomes trapped in a cycle of violence that serves purposes beyond his understanding.
character.occupation: Military officer, leader of a unit under Corvus
character.opening_state: Confident young officer; physically at peak; respected for strength; ambitious for advancement
character.key_transformation: Cursed during crucifixion; frozen at age 30; transformed into instrument of endless violence
character.closing_state: Trapped in curse; compulsive violence; autonomous aggression; serves purposes beyond understanding
character.arc_preview: From confident officer commanding execution detail, through supernatural curse triggered by participation in crucifixion, to trapped instrument of endless violence serving purposes beyond his control
